name: The Dreaming Tear
description: A crystalline vial suspended in mid-air, its contents now a swirling vortex of colors and energies, as if the very fabric of time itself had become trapped within its confines. The once-reflective surface now ripples with temporal chaos, a maelstrom of past, present, and future all jumbled together in a maddening dance.

name: The Dreamweaver's Journal
description: A leather-bound journal filled with cryptic notes and sketches of lunar cycles, now stained with yellow smudges from mashed banana and emitting a sweet, floral aroma.
